title: The Forest of trees and logs
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest conservation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Conservation of natural resources
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural resources - Environmental aspects

description: The forest is explored as a place of life - an environment with inter-relationships harbouring the living, providing food, and which, even in decay brings forth vitality. Our understanding of the role forests play in the biosphere of the planet may help us aid the forests to return to the grandeur which once was theirs.
